ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a ApsaraMQ for RocketMQ instance belongs.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: Creates an ApsaraMQ for RocketMQ 5.x instance.

DeleteInstance.title: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.summary: Deletes a ApsaraMQ for RocketMQ instance.

GetConsumerGroup.title: GetConsumerGroup
GetConsumerGroup.summary: Queries the details of a specified consumer group.

GetInstance.title: GetInstance
GetInstance.summary: Queries the detailed information about an instance.

GetTopic.title: GetTopic
GetTopic.summary: Queries the details of a specified topic.

ListConsumerGroupSubscriptions.title: ListConsumerGroupSubscriptions
ListConsumerGroupSubscriptions.summary: Queries the subscriptions of a consumer group.

ListConsumerGroups.title: ListConsumerGroups
ListConsumerGroups.summary: Queries the consumer groups in a specified instance.

ListTopics.title: ListTopics
ListTopics.summary: Queries the topics in a specified instance.

ResetConsumeOffset.title: ResetConsumeOffset
ResetConsumeOffset.summary: Resets the consumer offset of a consumer group.

UpdateConsumerGroup.title: UpdateConsumerGroup
UpdateConsumerGroup.summary: Updates the basic information about and the consumption retry policy of a consumer group.

UpdateInstance.title: UpdateInstance
UpdateInstance.summary: Updates the basic information and specifications of an ApsaraMQ for RocketMQ instance.

UpdateTopic.title: UpdateTopic
UpdateTopic.summary: Updates the basic information about a topic.
